caption: The boys room needed a major refresh and the whole room was designed around my favorite beds in the whole world! The Dorma by @montedesign is fully customizable from the head board and foot board height to the fabric and piping color. I got the Twin high headboard and high footboard all in ivory boucle with maple feet. The lines are soo classic and the fabrics are absolutely beautiful and look amazing with everything and I mean everything.  They also have a rounded version that’s soo beautiful it was hard to decide.  #interiordesign #homedecor #family
